sentences.en: All this is not to antedate the demise of the empire.
sentences.cn: 这一切不会使帝国提前衰亡.

sentences.en: He praised the union's aims but predicted its early demise.
sentences.cn: 他赞扬协会的目标,但预期这一协会很快会消亡.

sentences.en: I agree that the demise of London zoo would be terrible.
sentences.cn: 我也认为如果伦敦动物园不复存在的话那真是太糟糕了。

sentences.en: I know what demise means, Mr. Bartholomew.
sentences.cn: 我知道那个词儿的意思, 巴特罗米尔先生.

sentences.en: Its demise cannot be explained by high administrative and collection costs alone.
sentences.cn: 它的让位不能单独用高额的管理费用和征集费用来解释.

sentences.en: Narrator: Thus did man become the architect of his own demise.
sentences.cn: 旁白: 至此,人类开始成为自己的掘墓人.

sentences.en: Once a magnetic field generation, are not their own demise.
sentences.cn: 这种磁场一旦产生, 是不会自行消亡的.

sentences.en: Poor piggies. So friendly and yet unaware of their imminent demise.
sentences.cn: 可怜的猪仔啊,它们看起来那么友善,不知死之将至.

sentences.en: September 15 may stand as the date of its demise.
sentences.cn: 而9月15日就可以算作它断命的日子.

sentences.en: Smoking, rather than genetics, was the cause of his early demise.
sentences.cn: 导致他英年早逝的原因是吸烟而非遗传。

sentences.en: The demise of the industry has caused untold misery to thousands of hard-working tradesmen.
sentences.cn: 该行业的没落给数以千计辛苦经营的商贩带来了难言的苦楚。

sentences.en: the mystery surrounding Elena’s untimely demise
The roots of his demise lay much earlier in the Golitsin - Nossenko feud.
sentences.cn: 他失意的根源还要早得多,要追溯到戈里钦和森科问题的斗争上去.

sentences.en: The Union built fortifications, gathered up troops, and planned Hood's demise.
sentences.cn: 联邦军队已经在那里建好防御工事, 并且集结军队, 准备一举击溃虎德的军队.

sentences.en: The war brought about the industry's sudden demise.
sentences.cn: 战争道致这个行业就这么突然垮了.

sentences.en: Upon his demise the duke's house and other properties passed to his son.
sentences.cn: 公爵故世后,房子和其它财产便传给了儿子.

trans.tran_cn: 死亡，（不动产的）转让，让位
trans.tran_en: the end of something that used to exist
